DOC.brief_summary: In the oncology practice, The National Union of the Centres of Fight Against the Cancer recently published the Standards, Options and Recommendations for the coverage of the pains provoked during the invasive gestures of a short duration realized at patients affected by cancer. These support the use of the Kalinox ® 170 bar as therapeutic alternative for the preparation of the painful procedures of a short duration such as spinal taps or osseous at the adult.The objective of this study thus is to clarify the appropriate efficiency and the tolerance of the equimolar mixture protoxide of nitrogen / oxygen during invasive procedures realized in adult oncology with regard to the analgesic reference methods and to the effect placebo leads by the accompaniment of the patient during the procedure.
DOC.brief_title: Study of the Efficacy of Kalinox® 170 Bar in Adult Oncology
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 year OMS between 0 to 3 Patient who has to undergo an invasive gesture or a painful care Absence of contraindication to the administration of the product Patient already included in another incompatible study with this protocol Patient incapable of selfassessment by the EVA Confusional syndrome OMS > 3 Patient already included in this protocol Exclusion criteria linked to the product
DOC.keyword: Patient in a oncology unit who has to undergo a painful or invasive procedure
